name: Pocket Soccer Manager
description:
Pocket Soccer Manager is a 2D mobile puzzle game. In this game, you need to use your wisdom to help White and Green to win the first prize in the town's soccer match. Take advantage of their abilities wisely, and wish you will be the best soccer manager.

Credits:

  • Yaonan (Machilus) Wang / Designer, Programmer, Artist
  • Xihao He / Designer, Programmer, Artist
  • Instructor: Steven Goodale
  • Made in GAM 651: Prototype Game Development

Platform/System:

  • Built in Unity
  • For Android Mobile
